version_description: Minor fixes with localisation text.
Minor fixes with localisation text.
- Enhanced the app functionality and solved minor bugs.
- Enhanced the app functionality and solved minor bugs.

- Provided the option to share your newly created Contacts Backup instantly now.
- More options provided to share your backup along with the Email option.
- Option provided to include Photo of the contact when creating new backup.
- Backup Reminder option available for weekly as well as monthly reminder.

- Provided the option to share your newly created Contacts Backup instantly now.
- More options provided to share your backup along with the Email option.
- Option provided to include Photo of the contact when creating new backup.
- Backup Reminder option available for weekly as well as monthly reminder.
Enhanced in app functionality and solved minor bug issues in the app.
Enhanced in app functionality and solved minor bug issues in the app.
Solved minor bugs and improvements in app functionality.
Solved minor bugs and improvements in app functionality.

- Now we provided cloud support for backup your contacts.
- You can recover your contacts on any other or same mobile via just login with same account.
- Brand new app design.
- This app is updated for best experience in iOS 11.
- This app is updated for best experience in iPhone X.
- Solved minor bugs and improvements in app functionality.

- Now we provided cloud support for backup your contacts.
- You can recover your contacts on any other or same mobile via just login with same account.
- Brand new app design.
- This app is updated for best experience in iOS 11.
- This app is updated for best experience in iPhone X.
- Solved minor bugs and improvements in app functionality.

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve Smart Contacts Backup Manager.

Here's what's new :
- Login is even more easy, Now you can login with your Phone number.
- Added ability to delete account. You can delete your account from Settings.
- Stability and reliability improvements.
- Solved minor bugs and improvements in app functionality.

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve Smart Contacts Backup Manager.

Here's what's new :
- Login is even more easy, Now you can login with your Phone number.
- Added ability to delete account. You can delete your account from Settings.
- Stability and reliability improvements.
- Solved minor bugs and improvements in app functionality.

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve Smart Contacts Backup Manager.
Here's what's new :
- Now you can export your contacts directly by tap on backup list.
- Stability and reliability improvements.
- Solved minor bugs and improvements in app functionality.

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve Smart Contacts Backup Manager.
Here's what's new :
- Now you can export your contacts directly by tap on backup list.
- Stability and reliability improvements.
- Solved minor bugs and improvements in app functionality.

This new version includes:

- minor bug fixes, following your feedback
- improvements of the app's general performance

Keep writing at support-contact-backup@approver-studio.com !
And if you like Contacts Backup Pro, make sure to rate it on the store :)
